programme.desc: Former boxing promoter Kellie Maloney was left fighting for her life after a second round of facial feminisation to make her face more womanly. Former model Linsey Dawn McKenzie managed to receive an unintended facelift, which left her with no earlobes and huge scars. Plus, the programme also follows La Toya Jackson's surgical journey. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, including celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: In this hypnotic thriller, Arthur and Norma Lewis (James Marsden and Cameron Diaz) experience a crisis of conscience when they receive a mysterious box with a button inside that will grant them $1 million and kill a random person when pressed(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: The eldest son of a 1950s-era Midwestern family sets out on an existential journey that leads him to question his faith while seeking the answers to life's most challenging mysteries in this evocative drama from celebrated director Terrence Malick.Meanwhile, as Jack's innocence slowly erodes, his turbulent relationship with his father becomes the specter that hangs over his every thought and action. Giovanni Ribisi plays Elliott, the enigmatic engineer who persuades the survivors they can scavenge enough from the crashed plane to build another to fly them to safety while, unlike in the original, a love interest is provided by Miranda Otto as the tough yet vulnerable Kelly. Superbly photographed by Brendan Galvin, this stands against the original, with the mix of characters providing the drama and the take-off of the cobbled-together aircraft a nail-biting climax(n)

programme.title: Never Die Alone
programme.desc: Ernest Dickerson's tough crime thriller stars rapper DMX as King David, a drugs-dealer who uses a mix of heroin and violence to get his way with women and fellow hoods alike. The film is told from beyond the grave - it opens with King David in his coffin. But his narrative is supplemented by his diaries which are in the hands of hack writer Paul, which explains the twists and turns in the final story, involving a deal with a Mr Big and an out-of-control underling who tries to play both ends against the middle(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Based on a series of books by Patrick O'Brian, MASTER AND COMMANDER plunges viewers deep into the story of a British Navy ship at sea during the Napoleonic war. Russell Crowe stars as Aubrey, the charismatic captain who wrestles with issues like honour, pride, duty, sacrifice and loyalty while using ingenious tactics to engage his prey--a much larger and better-equipped French Man o' War. Paul Bettany plays his friend, the ship's doctor(n)

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An FBI agent tries to protect an autistic child from government operatives after the boy deciphers a national-security code(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Action drama in which 'Dirty' Harry Callahan returns to investigate an underground betting ring in which the participants gamble on the deaths of prominent San Francisco citizens. One such 'dead pool' list contains the names of a rock star, a film critic and a talk-show host, all of whom have been systematically murdered. As Callahan looks further into the murders, he finds another well-known name on the list - his own(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick O'Connell fights to prevent a resurrected Chinese emperor taking over the world(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Luke Wilson, Vince Vaughn and Will Ferrell star in this raucous comedy reminiscent of "Animal House." They play three disillusioned men who decide to start a fraternity near their old college in an effort to recapture their youth(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: In this hilarious fish-out-of-water comedy, two Puerto Rican NYC cops are asked by a pair of French fashion designers to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag(n)

programme.title: Private Benjamin
programme.desc: Goldie Hawn stars in this comedy as a high society woman who joins the army after her newly married husband dies on their wedding night(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Martha finally finds her Mr. Right, but he has just one flaw: he is a hitman on the run from his former employers, a crime cartel(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: In this fact-based biopic, Johnny Depp plays George Jung, an American said to have been the nation's top supplier of cocaine in the '70s and '80s(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: A survivalist teams up with a military man to slay fire-breathing dragons in post-apocalyptic 2020(n)

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: Explosive action thriller starring Steven Seagal as an ex- DEA agent who comes out of retirement to take on a deadly gang of Jamaican drug-dealers terrorising Chicago(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of a promising young journalist who is disgraced after being caught fabricating articles. As an ambitious reporter at The New Republic magazine, Stephen Glass wins praise for his high-profile political scoops. But when the magazine's editor - Glass's mentor - is fired, his work and his methods come under much closer scrutiny(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Grand Visions is a short season of films driven by the vision and boldness of strong directors; passion projects made on a grand and uncompromising scale. The season kicks off with director Baz Luhrmann's western/ war adventure/ romance hybrid that's set in the Australian outback and stars Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman. It is 1939 and Lady Sarah Ashley has travelled halfway round the world to persuade her husband to sell his cattle station and return back home to Blighty. It's soon obvious that she hasn't anticipated the primitive realities of life in northern Australia, nor has her upbringing prepared her for an encounter with the likes of the rough and ready drover who is instructed to chaperone her from Darwin to the ranch. But the pair are fated to become much more closely acquainted than either could have imagined. The plot also encompasses the lot of the region's Aboriginal people, via the plight of local lad Nullah, and the first Japanese attacks on the northern territories. Edited for language(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A teenager turns his house into a brothel while his parents are away in this sharp comedy highlighted by Cruise's star-making performance(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between rookie cop Ben Barber (Kevin Hart) and his seasoned partner (and future brother-in-law) James Payton (Ice Cube) in this sequel to the hit action comedy Ride Along. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a local drug lord with the help of a savvy detective (Olivia Munn). Directed by Tim Story(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Ben Affleck dons the mask of the blind lawyer-turned-superhero to battle Kingpin and Bullseye in this dark and sexy adaptation of the Marvel comic. Jennifer Garner heats things up as the leather-clad Elektra. Acclaimed Hong Kong fight choreographer Cheung-Yan Yuen handles the dizzying action scenes(n)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: Action drama in which an old Vietnam veteran who is disillusioned with the hi-tech, by-the-book modern military, requests a posting to his old unit to see out his soldiering days. Tough and foul-mouthed, the marine sergeant puts a squadron of lazy young recruits through their paces, turning them into a well disciplined fighting unit - just in time for a hazardous rescue mission to the small Caribbean island of Grenada(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube and Spike Jonze star in this all-action adventure. A small group of adventurous American soldiers in Iraq at the end of the Gulf War are determined to steal a huge cache of gold reputed to be hidden somewhere near their desert base(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Slick Hollywood fixer Eddie Mannix (Josh Brolin) is pressed into action when superstar actor Baird Whitlock (George Clooney) is kidnapped and held for ransom by a mysterious group. Mannix races to quietly collect the ransom money without gossip columnists Thessaly and Thora Thacker (Tilda Swinton in a dual role) catching wind of the scandal. Alden Ehrenreich, Ralph Fiennes, Scarlett Johansson, Jonah Hill, Frances McDormand, and Channing Tatum co-star in this comedy set in Hollywood's golden age. Directed by Joel and Ethan Coen(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Comedy action adventure with the three glamorous Angels returning to hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBI's Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want(n)

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: In this irreverent spin on the superhero genre, a mercenary reinvents himself as a wisecracking antihero called Deadpool after an experiment leaves him with advanced healing powers and a disfigured face. He then sets out to seek revenge on those responsible for his transformation(n)

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: In this hypnotic thriller, Arthur and Norma Lewis (James Marsden and Cameron Diaz) experience a crisis of conscience when they receive a mysterious box with a button inside that will grant them $1 million and kill a random person when pressed(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: The eldest son of a 1950s-era Midwestern family sets out on an existential journey that leads him to question his faith while seeking the answers to life's most challenging mysteries in this evocative drama from celebrated director Terrence Malick.Meanwhile, as Jack's innocence slowly erodes, his turbulent relationship with his father becomes the specter that hangs over his every thought and action. Giovanni Ribisi plays Elliott, the enigmatic engineer who persuades the survivors they can scavenge enough from the crashed plane to build another to fly them to safety while, unlike in the original, a love interest is provided by Miranda Otto as the tough yet vulnerable Kelly. Superbly photographed by Brendan Galvin, this stands against the original, with the mix of characters providing the drama and the take-off of the cobbled-together aircraft a nail-biting climax(n)

programme.title: Never Die Alone
programme.desc: Ernest Dickerson's tough crime thriller stars rapper DMX as King David, a drugs-dealer who uses a mix of heroin and violence to get his way with women and fellow hoods alike. The film is told from beyond the grave - it opens with King David in his coffin. But his narrative is supplemented by his diaries which are in the hands of hack writer Paul, which explains the twists and turns in the final story, involving a deal with a Mr Big and an out-of-control underling who tries to play both ends against the middle(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Based on a series of books by Patrick O'Brian, MASTER AND COMMANDER plunges viewers deep into the story of a British Navy ship at sea during the Napoleonic war. Russell Crowe stars as Aubrey, the charismatic captain who wrestles with issues like honour, pride, duty, sacrifice and loyalty while using ingenious tactics to engage his prey--a much larger and better-equipped French Man o' War. Paul Bettany plays his friend, the ship's doctor(n)

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An FBI agent tries to protect an autistic child from government operatives after the boy deciphers a national-security code(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Who Killed the Candy Heiress? The Helen Brach Story
programme.desc: Who Killed the Candy Heiress? The Helen Brach Story. A troubled conman's past catches up to him in the A&E documentary American Justice: Who Killed the Candy Heiress -- Helen Bach. When millionairess Helen Brach disappeared in 1977, her absence wasn't noticed for two weeks. A fan of the horse races, Brach spent her time at the stables with her prize-winning breeds. The police were baffled by the case and came up with no suspects for 20 years. Then, in 1995, a list was compiled while working on the capture of an ill-willed ladies man named Richard Bailey which piqued the interest of detectives. Turns out Bailey was a costly habit for rich women. Prosecutors' suppositions were so strong that Bailey was convicted of the plot and sentenced to life in prison. Through interviews and footage, A&E reconstructs the case of the missing millionaire(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney struggles with the fact that all his closest friends have settled down into relationships, and looks forward to receiving some much-needed bachelor support in the form of a visit from his gay brother James. However, when his sibling arrives, he reveals he too is settling down and planning to adopt a baby. Guest starring Wayne Brady.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam worries that sexual tension may develop between him and his long-time friend Emmy. Beverly is caught reading Erica's diary, and vows to trust her daughter instead of snooping in future. However, her new faith is soon taken advantage of. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry and Erica join Adam and his friends Emmy, Dana and Chad on a treasure hunt inspired by the Goonies when Pops misplaces some family jewels and Beverly threatens to reorganise his financial affairs if he fails to find them. Comedy, starring Jeff Garlin and Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard receives shocking news as everyone prepares for the re-opening of the comic-book store. Meanwhile, Penny tries to teach Sheldon how to `let it go', but she is unable to follow her own advice when she learns something infuriating about Amy. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Fillion, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny agree to participate in an unusual experiment, and Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape from a `zombie'. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette run into trouble at the airport after returning from Mrs Wolowitz's funeral. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Meld and Joe write thank you cards to everyone who sent them wedding gifts, and pretend to be delighted with a huge, ugly coffee maker given to them by Aunt Bunny and Uncle Bert. Meld makes Joe return the machine to the shop, but then Bunny and Bert pay an unexpected visit to the newlyweds. Lennox is upset when Marco gets an offer he cannot refuse. Valerie Harper (Rhoda) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel discovers that Joe used to be a member of a boy band in his youth, but when she buys Dani a piano to foster her dreams of a musical career, she is surprised to find that Joe is completely opposed to the idea of his daughter attempting to become a musician. Zander tries to keep it a secret from his girlfriend Lilah that he and Lennox are working together.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben receives an anonymous note from a former love interest asking for a second chance, and does everything he can to find the mystery girl. Danny tries to get Riley back after a misunderstanding, while Tucker, Riley and Bonnie enter Emma into a baby beauty pageant so Tucker can use the footage for the news segment of his TV show - though Riley takes things too far.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: When Ben's first date with a new flame doesn't go well, Danny and Riley step in to help sort out the couple's issues, but their assistance quickly causes more harm than good. Tucker decides to tell his father about his new relationship with Renee - who is one of his father's colleagues - but starts to worry when he learns that his father may have romantic feelings for Renee too.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: When Dre struggles to cope with his yearly medical examination, Pops admits that he hasn't seen a doctor in years.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Another Father's Day overshadowed by familial duties prompts Dre and his colleagues to transform the occasion into Daddy's Day, an altogether more enjoyable celebration.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam is disappointed to be cast in a minor role in the school musical, so Beverly helps him to land a leading part in a competing show. Barry falls out with his father when Murray insists on leaving sporting events early to beat the traffic. Ana Gasteyer (Suburgatory) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry and Adam form a garage rock band and ask Laineyn and Erica to get involved, eventually leading to unexpected consequences. Meanwhile, Charles and Diana's royal wedding has Bev wanting to renew her wedding vows with Murray. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman when he was away on his North Sea research expedition. After driving all the way to Las Vegas, she must now decide whether she wants to go through with the wedding. Back home, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy tells him she wants them to take a relationship break.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard meets up with the woman he kissed during his trip in the hope of setting Penny's mind at ease, while Sheldon films a special episode of Fun with Flags after his break-up with Amy. Bernadette feels guilty about keeping a secret from Penny.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's the day of Armstrong's hearing and Dirk is worried about Cindy's mental state. Meanwhile, Scott sets Brody up with Lisa hoping to drive a wedge between Brody and Damon, and Louis and Zack have a brief reconciliation.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Brendan's budget goes into overdrive as the group races Italian sports cars, before they let off steam playing bubble football.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard's purchase of a dining-room table causes Sheldon to re-evaluate his life. Meanwhile, Howard is offered the chance to go back to the International Space Station, and Bernadette struggles to decide whether to encourage him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Melissa Rauch.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After arguing with Sheldon, Howard tries to make amends by taking him to Nasa's headquarters in Houston. Elsewhere, Penny has second thoughts about quitting her job as a waitress when her car dies, while Amy tries to find Raj a date. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Groom Billy plans a pig-themed wedding, complete with a world record pig parade, but his prim and proper bride Steph may not be pleased with his decision.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity First Dates
programme.desc: Pop star Samuel Preston shot to fame when he fell in love with Chantelle Houghton inside the Big Brother house. He wonder whether lightning will strike again on his date with South African Nichole. Scarlett Moffatt from Gogglebox is hoping that martial arts fighter Tommy will prove to be full of banter and happy to see her `without her fake tan on'. Entrepreneur Jo Wood seeks someone who shares her love of a good time, while Britain's Got Talent winner Ashleigh Butler hopes fellow dog-lover Elliot will live up to her - and Pudsey's - expectations.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is forced to consider how far he is willing to push himself in the name of science when a wealthy benefactor makes an indecent proposal. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, with Jessica Walter (Arrested Development) and Joshua Malina (The West Wing).(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard is torn between his relationship with Bernadette and pleasing his mother - and comes up with a solution that leaves everyone unsatisfied. Leonard rekindles his romance with Raj's sister Priya, while Amy uses Penny's emotions as the basis for a research project.(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Youngstown Boys. An exploration of the class and power dynamics in college sports through the interconnected journeys of one-time dynamic running back Maurice Clarett and former elite head coach Jim Tressel. Clarett and Tressel emerged from opposite sides of the tracks in Youngstown, Ohio, and then joined up for a magical season at Ohio State University in 2002 that produced the first national football championship for the school in over 30 years. Shortly after, Clarett was suspended from college football and began a downward spiral that ended with a prison term(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.desc: 07-30-2017. Featured: Patriots WR Macolm Mitchell, a children's book author who is on a mission to help kids fall in love with reading; and the emotional story of former University of Virginia women's basketball standout Schuye LaRue(n)

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali, this fast-paced competitive talk show features a panel of four well known reporters from around the United States debating hot-topic sports issues. Points are awarded for the best arguments, and the winner receives 30 seconds to discuss a topic of their choice(n)

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: A lively sports-talk show features opinionated reporters debating topical headlines. An on-screen 'rundown' of the topics is a signature of the series, which also includes guests in and out of the studio, and responses to viewer calls and e-mail(n)

programme.title: SC Featured
programme.desc: In-depth athlete profiles and unique stories from all areas of the sports world(n)

programme.title: SC Featured
programme.desc: In-depth athlete profiles and unique stories from all areas of the sports world(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: An exploration of the effects of the eruption of volcanos in the ocean. From these violent beginnings emerge islands and coral reefs that are home to a vast array of wildlife, including giant manta rays and vampire bugs that thrive in the tropical snow, after a process that takes millions of years. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Water-dwelling giants of the late Jurassic period, when the Earth's coastlines were reshaped by a steady rise in sea levels and thousands of square miles of land were flooded. These shallow seas supported a revolution in marine life, and reptiles such as plesiosaurs shared the water with liopleurodon, the largest carnivore on the planet.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Flying reptiles from the early Cretaceous period, known as pterosaurs, which had small bodies and hollow bones, and flew by means of wings covered with a membrane. Most pterosaurs could stay airborne under their own power, but the largest ones, with a wingspan of up to 11 metres, probably relied on thermal currents.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor visits Panama, Central America, to begin the next leg of his adventure. There he teams up with a record-breaking angler to hook peacock bass at Lake Gatun. He also travels east to the Bayano River, where he hopes to encounter monster-sized tarpon renowned for their ferocity, and takes a trip to the Islas de las Perlas 30 miles off the Pacific coast. Finally, he sets out in search of huge billfish, but finds himself caught in an electrical storm.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mightiest rivers in the world, from the deep waters of Siberia's Lake Baikal, home to the world's only freshwater seal, to the wetlands downstream of Earth's tallest waterfall patrolled by frenzied piranhas. There is also footage of the lightning-quick ambush of wildebeest by crocodiles in Africa and macaque monkeys swimming underwater to catch crabs in Indonesia. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: An exploration of the effects of the eruption of volcanos in the ocean. From these violent beginnings emerge islands and coral reefs that are home to a vast array of wildlife, including giant manta rays and vampire bugs that thrive in the tropical snow, after a process that takes millions of years. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough investigates the opportunities tides create for marine life, showing giant stingrays gliding on currents for a rest, South African sea snails surfing the waves in pursuit of a meal, crabs playing football on a beach, and bottlenose dolphins embarking on a dangerous game of catch. In the oceanic world each turn of the tide can mean life or death for its inhabitants.(n)

programme.title: Outback Rangers
programme.desc: The team checks the popular waterfalls are free from crocodiles. The lives of armed rangers at Kakadu National Park in the Northern Territory, Australia.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: The struggle for survival on the region's isolated islands, home to flightless parrots, burrowing bats, giant skinks and tree-dwelling kangaroos. The documentary reveals how the arrival of new species can upset the delicate natural balance, with disastrous consequences, and explores the human history of the region. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: How the plant-eating leaellynasaura coped with conditions in the Antarctic at a time when the continent was covered in trees and existed for half the year in warm sunshine and the other in freezing twilight. The extreme variations in temperature brought about an epic struggle for survival as creatures strove to keep one step ahead of their polar predators.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is 65 million years ago and time is fast running out for the dinosaurs. As the Cretaceous period draws to a close and massive volcanic activity poisons the air, an enormous comet is the harbinger of doom for the huge creatures and augurs a new chapter in Earth's natural history. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor heads for the city of Kochi on the south-west coast of India, where he tries his hand at a fishing technique developed in the early 15th century. He is also given a chance to take part in an evening dance performance, but fails to make any catches at the popular resort of Alappuzha. He concludes this leg of his adventure in the Maldives, braving bad weather to land a red snapper.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the world's caves, including the Lechuguilla Cave in America, which contains chambers filled with 6m-long crystals. He observes creatures in Texas and Thailand that never see daylight, and inside Deer Cave in Borneo he finds five million bats whose droppings support an entire ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: The struggle for survival on the region's isolated islands, home to flightless parrots, burrowing bats, giant skinks and tree-dwelling kangaroos. The documentary reveals how the arrival of new species can upset the delicate natural balance, with disastrous consequences, and explores the human history of the region. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Exploring the wealth of marine life that inhabits the ocean's edge, dealing with the dangers of an ever-shifting environment. David Attenborough observes nesting seabirds in east Russia, Patagonian killer whales, Newfoundland caplin fish, walruses, and Brazilian green turtles - which make their annual expedition to an island in the middle of the Atlantic to lay their eggs. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Planet Ice
programme.desc: Documentary taking a scientific tour of glaciers in the Andes mountain range, which span South America, a continent largely associated with tropical weather.(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: For 60 years, a Tibetan monk has protected an ancient scroll which gives its owner immortality and incredible power. With a new generation of Nazis determined to snatch the scroll, the monk recruits a young pickpocket to help defeat evil(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife(n)

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: A rickety adventure about American pilots who flew for France's Lafayette Escadrille in World War I. James Franco, Jean Reno, Jennifer Decker. Directed by Tony Bill(n)

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Action thriller concerning an ambitious Interpol agent who targets corruption at the top levels of the world's largest banking institutions. The world's most powerful banks have become hopelessly corrupt, prompting Interpol agent Louis Salinger and Manhattan assistant district attorney Eleanor Whitman follow a dangerous money trail from Berlin to Milan to New York and Istanbul(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: John Travolta goes bad as the pilot who steals two nukes, pursued by Christian Slater and perky park ranger Samantha Mathis. Ballistic action from John(n)

programme.title: Eddie Murphy: Raw
programme.desc: The comedian's 1987 performance at Madison Square Garden(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: For 60 years, a Tibetan monk has protected an ancient scroll which gives its owner immortality and incredible power. With a new generation of Nazis determined to snatch the scroll, the monk recruits a young pickpocket to help defeat evil(n)

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
programme.desc: Supposedly, when Sean Connery refused to star in another James Bond movie, producers Harry Saltzman and Albert Broccoli vowed to show up the insolent Connery by literally "creating" a new Bond from the ground up. That's why professional model and TV commercial-spokesman George Lazenby is cast as 007 in the 1969 filmization of Ian Fleming's 1963 Bond novel On Her Majesty's Secret Service. As a result, the film is one of the few in the series that could boast more than a passing resemblance to the Fleming original. This time around, Bond quits the secret service when he is told to end his obsessive search for master criminal Blofeld (Telly Savalas). While trailing his quarry in Portugal, Bond falls in love with Tracy Draco (Diana Rigg), daughter of a notorious gangster (Gabriele Ferzetti). The elder Draco agrees to help Bond find Blofeld, with the implicit understanding that Bond will marry Tracy. Bond's mission takes him to a Swiss mountain retreat, wherein Blofeld is executing his master plan of destroying the world's agricultural economy. When all is said and done, Bond does marry Tracy, but the honeymoon ends in sudden tragedy(n)

programme.title: GoldenEye
programme.desc: A beautiful Russian mobster and the evil General Ourumov take over a Space Weapons Control Station and arm an attack satellite. The ensuing destruction leaves only one survivor, and James Bond is sent in to investigate. There he makes a surprising discovery as to who is behind all the mayhem(n)

programme.title: Goldfinger
programme.desc: Beginning innocently enough with a murder, James Bond finds himself investigating Auric Goldfinger, a gold dealer who the Bank of England suspects is stockpiling huge amounts of gold bullion. However, he soon uncovers a far more sinister plot called Operation Grand Slam and has a fair bit of bowler-hat-dodging to do from Goldfinger's manservant, Oddjob(n)

programme.title: Licence to Kill
programme.desc: When his friend is seriously injured on a mission, vengeful spy James Bond sets out on a mission to get the culprit who did it, but he'll have to do it alone when MI6 disapproves(n)

programme.title: For Your Eyes Only
programme.desc: James Bond races the Russians to locate a sunken spy ship that contains an important technological device that, in the wrong hands, could prove costly to the British Navy(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Young therapist Claire (Anne Hathaway) is assigned to counsel the survivors of a plane crash and is intrigued by Eric, the most secretive of them. In spite of that, her professional relationship with him blossoms into a romance as the survivors begin to disappear mysteriously, one by one. Claire suspects that Eric may hold the answers and becomes determined to uncover the truth, no matter the consequences(n)

programme.title: The Hitcher
programme.desc: Remake of the 1986 chiller about a couple who pick up a psychopathic hitchhiker(n)

programme.title: Up in Smoke
programme.desc: This film, while despised by critics and lovers of cinema, is cherished by fans of the comedy team, Cheech and Chong. In this wildly irreverent comedy, Man Stoner (Tommy Chong) is thrown out of his rich parent's Hollywood Hill's home and hooks up with Pedro De Pacas (Cheech Marin) the leader of a rock-and-roll band. In a van made entirely of pure marijuana, the two set out on a ride from Los Angeles to Mexico and back. Despite all of this, they still have time to enter and win a "battle-of-the-bands" contest. Up in Smoke, produced and directed by Lou Alder is Cheech and Chong's first and best film(n)

programme.title: Goldfinger
programme.desc: Beginning innocently enough with a murder, James Bond finds himself investigating Auric Goldfinger, a gold dealer who the Bank of England suspects is stockpiling huge amounts of gold bullion. However, he soon uncovers a far more sinister plot called Operation Grand Slam and has a fair bit of bowler-hat-dodging to do from Goldfinger's manservant, Oddjob(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: The Tailor of Panama
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan is a British spy banished to Panama after a series of indiscretions. Trying to win himself back into favour, he latches on to tailor Geoffrey Rush, whose wife works for the government. Rush, reluctantly blackmailed into providing intelligence, offers Brosnan increasingly lurid stories which, embellished again and sent to London, create a political incident that begins to spiral out of control(n)

programme.title: GoldenEye
programme.desc: A beautiful Russian mobster and the evil General Ourumov take over a Space Weapons Control Station and arm an attack satellite. The ensuing destruction leaves only one survivor, and James Bond is sent in to investigate. There he makes a surprising discovery as to who is behind all the mayhem(n)

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt(n)

programme.title: A View to a Kill
programme.desc: MI6 agent James Bond's latest mission is to foil the evil plan of technology mogul Max Zorin, who wants to cause an earthquake that will wipe out his competitors in Silicon Valley(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: In the Offing. A sitcom about a young pro-basketball star and his opportunistic family entourage begins with the player arriving in Atlanta, where he deals with a new city, a new team and the same old relatives who take advantage of him and his generosity(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: On the Carpet. At a charity event for an abused child, Cam's mother goes overboard detailing a story about her son's upbringing, while Uncle Julius steps up as a "talent scout" for Cam(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti-drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life more seriously(n)

programme.title: Border Run
programme.desc: A conservative Phoenix television reporter (Sharon Stone) gets caught in a treacherous game of deception and death when she goes to Mexico to investigate the disappearance of her brother in this drama based on a true story(n)

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: A police officer has been disgraced in front of both the department and the entire city, and when the sadistic gang that wronged him attempts to cement their grip on the terrified community, the only man who can come to their aid is the one nobody believes in anymore as the long-running Police Story saga receives an exciting breath of fresh-air from director Benny Chan. Police Inspector Wing (Chan) used to be Hong Kong's top cop, but when his entire team is wiped out by a youthful group of cold-blooded bank robbers, Wing quickly falls into a deep depression. A year after everyone including Wing's fiancée has lost their faith in the fallen police inspector, Wing gets a second shot at glory when he is assigned an ambitious new partner and given the opportunity to bring the gang that nearly destroyed his life to justice(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: Robert Redford plays a CIA researcher whose job somehow triggered the murder of seven of his colleagues(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: This sequel to Speed sees Sandra Bullock back and Jan de Be Bont directing but with Jason Patric taking over the Keanu Reeves role. The pair are an item and decide on a romantic cruise to the Caribbean. Unfortunately, also aboard the cruise liner are a gathering of diamond merchants, complete with their wares and arch-villain Willem Defoe, who plans to steal their merchandise. Unlike the original Speed, where the trick was that the bus would explode if it slowed down, this time, speed is of the essence - the plan is to ram the ship into dry land and, in the mayhem, escape with the loot. Bullock and Patric are perfect as the dynamic duo who save the day and the ocean-going scenario allows for more spectacular special effects than the original(n)

programme.title: American Ninja 3: Blood Hunt
programme.desc: US ninjas Joe Armstrong and Curtis Jackson enter a martial arts competition hosted by a deranged doctor known as The Cobra(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti-drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life more seriously(n)

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: The story of Dr. Peyton Westlake, a brilliant young scientist who is in love with attorney Julie Hastings and close to a breakthrough in his research on synthetic skin. Peyton seems destined for a happy life when, suddenly, his world blows up in his face. This fantasy-thriller from director Sam Raimi ("The Evil Dead"), mixes elements of horror, tragedy, action, romance and wry wit, presented in a sleek visual style reminiscent of a dark comic book sprung to life(n)

programme.title: The Detonator
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an undercover CIA agent attempting to thwart the sale of a nuclear weapon is forced to do battle with a dangerous horde of murderous arms dealers(n)

programme.title: Stripes

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: A bump on the head robs Adrian of his memory, leaving him struggling to solve the greatest mystery of all - the riddle of his own identity. Stranded in a strange town, he also catches a killer while struggling to piece together his past. Guest starring Laurie Metcalf (Roseanne).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: An actress is pushed to her death from a hotel balcony during a fundraising event for a local theatre production. Lisbon and the team learn that there is a long list of suspects, from the fading leading lady to the vindictive dancers in the supporting cast. Jane hopes Jason Lennon will emerge from his coma with information that will finally lead him to Red John.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the rest of the CBI team investigate when the owner of a dilapidated Wild West tourist town is murdered. Meanwhile, Kirkland is busy trying to find out how much Jane knows about Red John. Is the Homeland Security agent in league with the serial killer?.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A girl is found dead in suspicious circumstances and a well-connected classmate, previously accused of raping her, immediately catches Brenda's attention.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A reporter is the first person on the scene when a man wearing a surveillance wire in downtown Los Angeles is shot dead at point-blank range. As Brenda investigates the victim's connection to a drug ring, she and Fritz argue over who should take control of the case.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Naval intelligence ensign is killed in an unusual car accident. Gibbs and his team are reunited with old friend Ned Dorneget, who is now working with NCIS cyber operations, and NSA attorney Jake Malloy to investigate the case, and discover a conspiracy involving terrorist recruitment on the internet.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Special Agent Ned Dorneget of the NCIS cyber division joins the team to further their investigation into The Calling, the insidious terror network radicalising youngsters via the internet. When it emerges young suicide bomber Bradley was not, in fact, affiliated with The Calling, Gibbs and his colleagues realise they might be back to square-one. Determined to bring the organisation down, the agents pursue two new leads, an arms dealer who may be supplying The Calling with their signature German S-mines, and another boy given a deadly mission by the terrorists. Guest starring Matt Jones.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team investigate the mysterious death of a woman who received relationship advice from a radio-show host, and Rigsby and Van Pelt go undercover as a troubled couple in the hope of finding a lead. Crime drama, starring Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: When JJ LaRoche's house is robbed, he personally requests Jane's help with the case. The former head of CBI internal affairs tells Jane that one of the thieves got away with the secret plastic container he's kept hidden for nine years and begs him to solve the case before the contents are revealed and his life is destroyed. LaRoche suspects that the person responsible for high-level security leaks inside the agency is also behind the theft of the box. Guest starring Pruitt Taylor Vince, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Provenza and Flynn pose as hitmen to bring an attempted murder sting operation to a close, only to find all their evidence has been stolen while they stopped for lunch. Brenda is forced to free her suspect, and a furious Pope demands that Priory Homicide recover the missing items within 48 hours.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda struggles to decide how to handle the case of a missing boy - and as the investigation continues, suspicions arise as to whether he is a victim or a potential killer. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The death of Special Agent Ned Dorneget hits the team hard, and when Gibbs receives a visit from his late colleague's mother - CIA Officer Joanna Teague - he must decide whether to let her help with the investigation into the Calling. Meanwhile, Gibbs hopes his young charge Luke, formerly one of the Calling's radicalised footsoldiers, might be key to bringing the organisation down. However, when the terrorists discover where their defecting comrade has taken refuge, the abduct him and flee to Iraq. The team follows hot on their heels, but it seems Luke's ties to the Calling might be stronger than anyone at NCIS ever anticipated. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with guest Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: Marvel's Agent Carter
programme.desc: Peggy closes in on Howard Stark's stolen technology, but her secret mission could unravel when the SSR arrests Jarvis and a secret is revealed. Spy drama, starring Hayley Atwell.(n)

programme.title: Shots Fired
programme.desc: Lt Breeland and Sheriff Platt face intense scrutiny when the Auxiliary Deputy programme comes under investigation. Meanwhile, the judge makes a ruling in Ashe's custody case.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois prepares a Thanksgiving meal for friends and family, and Joe is shocked when his son Kevin Swanson, a soldier who was missing in action, returns from Iraq. Animation following the misadventures of the Griffin family, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffins are stranded near an Amish community when their car breaks down on the way home from an amusement park, and the family launches a crusade against the conservative locals when Meg falls for one of the boys.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan bullies Steve in the hope of toughening him up, but Francine does not approve of his approach. Meanwhile, Roger announces he is planning to study crime-scene photography.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan's efforts to get his family in shape for a neighbourhood pool party end in disaster when he accidentally ruins the Smith name - so he decides to fake his family's death and move to escape the shame.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois goes to see the family doctor, who looks into her history and discovers she is Jewish, a revelation that pleases Peter - until a visit from the spirit of his dead father changes his mind.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie and Brian discover the people who moved in to Cleveland's old house are spies, and follow them on a mission to Russia. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine is swept off her feet by a romantic cyborg version of her husband who has come back from the future, and the encounter forces her to question her relationship with the real Stan. Meanwhile, Roger directs Steve and his friends in a remake of cult classic adventure movie The Goonies.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is initially impressed to discover Roger played in the 1980 US Olympic hockey team - but later finds that he took steroids to help improve his performance, and makes him give the medal back.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds becomes obsessed with Peter following the actor's unexpected arrival in Quahog, and Stewie lands himself in trouble when he takes the family car for a joyride.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Stewie travel back in time to January 1999 to witness the events of the pilot episode of Family Guy, Death Has a Shadow, and alter the course of history.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger enrols in a police academy after he and Francine fall victim to a mugger, hoping the course will help him learn how to defend himself. However, he falls under the influence of a corrupt cop (Bobby Cannavale). Meanwhile, Hayley's new friendship threatens her long-term relationship.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger kisses Francine in a drunken moment at a wine-tasting event, and when she decides to tell Stan about the incident, the panic-stricken alien tries to stop her. Meanwhile, Steve sets out to hone his skills at lucid dreaming, much to the amusement of Hayley and Klaus.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Captain's Marriage.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer is forced to attend anger-management classes for punching a police officer who claimed to be having an affair with his wife Karen. Unfortunately, he does not suspect his outburst of temper helped taint a crime scene and conceal a murder. Guest starring Glenne Headley (ER), Nicky Katt (Boston Public) and Misha Collins (Supernatural).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Red John strikes again just as Jane narrows down the list of people who could be the serial killer to seven suspects, and the subsequent investigation uncovers a link between the victim and the CBI consultant. Guest starring Laura San Giacomo (Saving Grace, Pretty Woman), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Candidate - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Private investigator Adrian Monk, whose obsessive-compulsive disorder enables him to focus on minor details and solve even the most baffling of cases, agrees to help the police catch would-be assassin of mayoral candidate Warren St Claire. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub, Bitty Schram and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When Detective Sanchez's brother is murdered in a drive-by shooting, Brenda and the team try to discover who is responsible - while preventing their colleague from exacting personal revenge. However, the investigation is compromised when residents of the area where the crime was committed refuse to co-operate.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a hairdresser and discovers a history of domestic violence. Meanwhile, Brenda's parents visit, but annoy her by spending much of the trip asking about her marriage plans. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs throws himself back into his work following his near-death experience, updating his appearance and tackling a new risky case alongside DEA agent Luis Mitchell, who wants help bringing down a drugs cartel. Concerned about his colleague's apparent enthusiasm to re-enter the field, DiNozzo discovers Mitchell is the son of a former NCIS agent who gave his life trying to save Gibbs' late wife and daughter, and this attachment is causing Gibbs to break his own rule against personal involvement in a case. However, a significant danger is posed by Benson Long, the cartel's head, and Mitchell's top target.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine is found murdered in Quantico, mere hours after calling Gibbs to discuss a possible case. In response, Bishop and McGee go undercover as a married couple to run surveillance on a lieutenant and his wife, who may be connected to the death. Starring Mark Harmon, Emily Wickersham and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is kidnapped, but manages to escape her captor, and the team discovers her abduction may be connected to her missing husband. Meanwhile, Abby knits everyone `gifts'.(n)

programme.title: Bull

Children's animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Short Circuit
programme.desc: A military robot is struck by lightning and develops a mind of its own. The machine embarks on a series of comic misadventures, but the company that made him want him back. He realises his only hope is to convince the scientist who invented him that he really is alive. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Steve Guttenberg, Ally Sheedy and Fisher Stevens.(n)

programme.title: ParaNorman
programme.desc: A misunderstood boy is able to communicate with ghosts haunting his neighbourhood, but no one else believes they exist. When a curse placed on the town by a witch centuries ago causes zombies to rise from the grave, it falls to the youngster to avert disaster. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kodi Smit-McPhee and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Mirror Mirror
programme.desc: A princess is banished to a dark forest after the death of her father, leaving her wicked stepmother to rule over the kingdom. The exiled aristocrat joins forces with a band of rebellious dwarfs to reclaim her father's throne and stop the evil queen seducing the prince she is in love with. Fantasy, starring Julia Roberts, Lily Collins and Armie Hammer.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Elizabeth Bennet is one of five sisters whose mother is determined to find them suitable husbands. The arrival of a wealthy gentleman and his friends at a nearby mansion leads to an introduction between Elizabeth and the aloof Mr Darcy, to whom she takes an instant dislike. However, an unexpected attraction eventually develops. Period drama based on Jane Austen's novel, starring Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen and Judi Dench.(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: An elite military team is nearly wiped out after a terrorist organisation replaces the US president with an imposter and has them declared enemies of the state. The handful of survivors seek the help of their original leader in avenging their fallen comrades. Action adventure sequel, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ray Park and Bruce Willis.(n)

programme.title: Force Majeure
programme.desc: A man on a skiing holiday in the French Alps flees for his life during an avalanche - leaving his family to their fate. While everyone survives, he soon finds his relationship with his wife and children unraveling as they struggle to forgive him for abandoning them. Drama, starring Johannes Kuhnke and Lisa Loven Kongsli. In Swedish, English, French and Norwegian.(n)

programme.title: Enduring Love
programme.desc: After witnessing a shocking accident, a man and his girlfriend attempt to put the traumatic events behind them - but their efforts are thwarted by the increasingly obsessive attentions of a loner who was also at the scene. Thriller, adapted from a novel by Ian McEwan, starring Daniel Craig, Rhys Ifans and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Oil prospectors travel to a recently discovered and remote Pacific island, where they encounter a gigantic gorilla. The men manage to capture the huge ape and bring it back to America - but the confused creature is terrified by events and escapes, wreaking havoc in New York. Remake of the classic 1933 fantasy adventure, with Jeff Bridges, Jessica Lange and Charles Grodin.(n)

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: When twins sisters meet for the first time at summer camp, they decide it is high time their estranged parents got back together again, and hatch an ingenious plan to reunite them by swapping places with each other. Disney comedy, starring Hayley Mills in a dual role as both sisters, alongside Maureen O'Hara, Brian Keith and Leo G Carroll.(n)

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of the US president is determined to lead a normal life and manages to persuade him to let her enrol at college as a normal student. However, she is unaware her father has hired a young special agent to go undercover at the same college - which creates a dilemma when she falls in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Katie Holmes, Marc Blucas, Michael Keaton and Amerie.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk Interview Special
programme.desc: A look at director Christopher Nolan's Second World War drama starring Tom Hardy, Cillian Murphy and Kenneth Branagh.(n)

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: A man has a chance encounter with an old schoolfriend whom he does not remember. A series of troubling further meetings and mysterious presents bring dark secrets to light and leave his wife concerned about how little she knows about his past. Thriller, starring Rebecca Hall, Jason Bateman and Joel Edgerton, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of a murdered executive tries to find a way to help his girlfriend bring his killer to justice and enlists the aid of a fraudulent medium - who is amazed and baffled when her psychic powers turn out to be all too real. programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten prepares grilled butterfly chicken, broccoli and tomato kebabs and a mixed berry pavlova.(n)

programme.desc: Ina Garten makes lemon fusilli with arugula and panacotta with balsamic strawberries.(n)

programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten takes a trip to the harbour with her husband, then prepares Scallops Provencal.(n)

programme.desc: The chef prepares potato dishes, including potato-wrapped chicken with pancetta and sage.(n)

programme.desc: Ree Drummond prepares kicked-up spicy wings, make-ahead sandwich rolls, a potato skins bar and salted pretzel brownies for her football crazy sons and their friends.(n)

programme.sub-title: Kitchen Confessional: Four Seasons On The Ranch.
programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes red wine pot roast, chicken tacos with strawberry salsa, roasted beet and goat cheese salad, and carrot and squash curry soup.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond whips up chocolate treats, including white chocolate raspberry cheesecake, dipped and decorated waffle cones, milk chocolate mousse, and a chocolate orange martini.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond prepares a picnic for the younger kids, including animal crackers, cereal chicken fingers, cucumber finger sandwiches, salad on a stick, and mini watermelon wedges.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares recipes using leeks, including pappardelle and a `concertina' squid dish. He also explains why the underrated vegetables can be a real asset in the kitchen and offers advice on how to grow and store them.(n)

programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: Tom becomes depressed after suffering a mild heart attack, so the management enlists Diana's help to try to cheer him up. Graham Crowden and Stephanie Cole star.(n)

programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: The managers of Bayview Retirement Village threaten to expel Diana, prompting Tom to come up with a blackmail plot. Comedy, starring Stephanie Cole and Graham Crowden.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin is shocked by Ann's left-wing tendencies when she raises money for the Open University and becomes involved with student politics. Comedy, starring Richard Briers.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Gordon's brother outstays his welcome, and a leaking swimming pool causes problems for the planned gala. Chris Barrie and Harriet Thorpe star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Pearl throws Howard out of the house, prompting him to declare he has sworn off women for good - but Hobbo and friends take it upon themselves to get him to talk to Marina first. Meanwhile, Cooper and Walsh have their car valeted after receiving complaints from the sergeant, Glenda tries to whip herself and Barry into shape in time for Gloria's wedding, and Hobbo finds it difficult to avoid Miss Davenport's attentions at the library.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Rights of Man (Except for Howard).
programme.desc: Hobbo tells Howard to stand up for himself if he still wants Pearl to take him back - but his wife pours cold water on his attempts to impress her. Marina decides to seize the moment with Mr Waddle, and the police pull Tom over for driving too slowly, only to end up sharing his bacon sandwiches. Russ Abbot, Robert Fyfe and Juliette Kaplan star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: In a bid to persuade Pearl to take back her errant husband, Howard's friends try to convince her he is living as a tramp - but he is far from happy at the prospect of going it alone in the wilderness. Meanwhile, Toby's attempt to regain Monica's affections is thwarted by a dog, and Marina decides to dress down for a change. Comedy, starring Russ Abbot, Robert Fyfe and Juliette Kaplan.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin is shocked by Ann's left-wing tendencies when she raises money for the Open University and becomes involved with student politics. Comedy, starring Richard Briers.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Gordon's brother outstays his welcome, and a leaking swimming pool causes problems for the planned gala. Chris Barrie and Harriet Thorpe star.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber starts work on another O-level course, but wily old cellmate Fletcher can't understand why he doesn't just cheat in the exam. Prison comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom tries to market his garden produce, but finds it more difficult than he imagined - especially with the added pressure of paying the household rates. Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: The Long Legs of the Law.
programme.desc: Rodney starts going out with a policewoman, much to the consternation of dodgy dealer Del-Boy, who is terrified that one wrong word from his little brother could see him banged up for five years. Vintage comedy, starring Nicholas Lyndhurst, David Jason and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: Geraldine rockets to stardom following an appearance on Terry Wogan's radio show, but finds fame something of a bugbear. Meanwhile, the Dibley Gala organisers prepare for a knockout performance. Guest starring former ballerina Darcey Bussell, with Dawn French and Gary Waldhorn.(n)

programme.title: Miranda
programme.desc: Penny threatens to cancel the shop owner's Christmas if she can't manage to get her life in order. With Stevie having secured herself new employment, Miranda decides to follow suit and get a job in an office - but it proves easier said than done. Meanwhile, her romantic situation is just as messy as her professional life. Can she and Gary remain just good friends? Miranda Hart, Patricia Hodge and Tom Ellis star.(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Childhood pals Edina and Patsy have a bitter bust-up and set out to find new best friends. Acclaimed comedy, starring Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, with guest appearances by Britt Ekland, Lulu and Zandra Rhodes.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Gavin starts his job in Cardiff and, while Stacey is thrilled to be back in Wales, Smithy has to come to terms with living in Essex without his best friend. Nessa has taken up residence in Dave's caravan in Sully and is getting ready for Neil's christening. The event means a big reunion for the gang, at which Smithy receives surprising news from Nessa, and Stacey has a special request for her husband.(n)

programme.title: Michael McIntyre's Comedy Roadshow
programme.desc: The comedian visits Brighton Dome, where Al Murray as the Pub Landlord headlines tonight's showcase of stand-ups from the comedy circuit, supported by Micky Flanagan, Jo Caulfield and Jon Richardson.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Mark and Sophie's big day arrives, but as the groom makes his way to the church with best man Jeremy and a very hung-over Super Hans, he continues to wrestle with crippling doubts that threaten to throw the event into disarray. Starring David Mitchell and Robert Webb.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Richie and Eddie's nocturnal peace is disturbed by a violent encounter with a burglar - resulting in the intruder's sack of loot falling into their sticky hands. Paul Bradley guests, with Adrian Edmondson and Rik Mayall.(n)

programme.title: Michael McIntyre's Comedy Roadshow
programme.desc: The comedian visits Brighton Dome, where Al Murray as the Pub Landlord headlines tonight's showcase of stand-ups from the comedy circuit, supported by Micky Flanagan, Jo Caulfield and Jon Richardson.(n)

programme.title: Little Britain
programme.desc: Dafydd has a big decision to make - stay at home as the only gay in the village, or travel to London and risk becoming one of the crowd. Florence agonises over whether to hang up her crinolines, Linda receives hassle from the students, and Mrs Emery has knee trouble - causing a stomach-churning consultation for the doctor. Imelda Staunton guest stars in a Christmas special from 2005.(n)

programme.desc: Richie and Eddie's nocturnal peace is disturbed by a violent encounter with a burglar - resulting in the intruder's sack of loot falling into their sticky hands. Paul Bradley guests, with Adrian Edmondson and Rik Mayall.(n)

programme.title: French and Saunders
programme.desc: Skits and sketches from comedy duo Dawn French and Jennifer Saunders, including a spoof of Baywatch, a secret gathering of gritty crime drama actresses and Helen Mirren trying to reinvent herself as the star of a family friendly sitcom. Guest starring Julia Sawalha and Dusty Springfield.(n)

programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: Tom makes a shocking proposition to the ailing Diana, while Jane seeks advice on becoming a nun and Geoffrey poses as a Hell's Angel in a misguided effort to impress his estranged wife Marion. Comedy, starring Graham Crowden, Stephanie Cole and Janine Duvitski.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin and Paul find themselves on opposing sides during a re-enactment of a battle between Cavaliers and Roundheads. Comedy, starring Richard Briers.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: The staff raise funds for new equipment so Gordon can stage a synchronised trampolining event, but when Laura's estranged American husband reappears and offers to foot the bill, questions are raised as to his ulterior motive. Chris Barrie and Julia St John star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Wondering if Pearl still loves him, Howard asks Hobbo to give her a peck on the cheek from him - only to become even more despondent when he sees his wife deliver a passionate kiss. Meanwhile, Glenda sends Barry off to paint a landscape, hoping the activity will distract him from his hunger - but fish and chips is the only thing on his mind. Comedy, starring Russ Abbot, Robert Fyfe and Juliette Kaplan.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: How Not to Cry at Weddings.
programme.desc: In the final episode of Roy Clarke's long-running comedy, everyone prepares for the wedding - prompting Howard and Pearl to look back at their relationship. Meanwhile, Alvin flirts with Stella, Toby tries to smarten himself up in a bid to win back Monica, and Clegg worries he has forgotten something important.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Lair of the Cat Creature.
programme.desc: A hang-gliding enthusiast crashes down in the village, mistakenly believing that he's landed in France, thus breaking the long-distance record. The gang tries to compensate for his disappointment by making him the best at something else - identifying a strange cat creature lurking in the woods. Peter Sallis, Frank Thornton and Brian Murphy star.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin and Paul find themselves on opposing sides during a re-enactment of a battle between Cavaliers and Roundheads. Comedy, starring Richard Briers.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: The staff raise funds for new equipment so Gordon can stage a synchronised trampolining event, but when Laura's estranged American husband reappears and offers to foot the bill, questions are raised as to his ulterior motive. Chris Barrie and Julia St John star.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Fletch tries to ensure that Godber has not blown his chances of early release after he gets into a fight a week before his parole board hearing. Final episode of the classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom's philosophy of life gains him two eager disciples - but he is soon anxious to be rid of them. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del gets the chance to sell off a couple of antique urns - the only problem being that one of them contains the ashes of Trigger's late grandfather. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Lennard Pearce and Roger Lloyd Pack.(n)

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: Alice shocks Geraldine with a monumental pre-wedding revelation, and the irreverent vicar is pleasantly surprised by David's dashing brother. Comedy, guest starring Clive Mantle, with Dawn French and Emma Chambers.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Wondering if Pearl still loves him, Howard asks Hobbo to give her a peck on the cheek from him - only to become even more despondent when he sees his wife deliver a passionate kiss. Meanwhile, Glenda sends Barry off to paint a landscape, hoping the activity will distract him from his hunger - but fish and chips is the only thing on his mind. Comedy, starring Russ Abbot, Robert Fyfe and Juliette Kaplan.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: How Not to Cry at Weddings.
programme.desc: In the final episode of Roy Clarke's long-running comedy, everyone prepares for the wedding - prompting Howard and Pearl to look back at their relationship. Meanwhile, Alvin flirts with Stella, Toby tries to smarten himself up in a bid to win back Monica, and Clegg worries he has forgotten something important.(n)

programme.title: Boomers
programme.desc: Comedy following the ups and downs of three newly retired couples living in the Norfolk resort of Thurnemouth. Joyce has organised a special lunch at a trendy gastropub to celebrate Carol and Trevor's 40th wedding anniversary, but her finely tuned plans are somewhat ruined by the arrival of Maureen and her lightweight mother Joan. Carol also looks set to put a dampener on the happy occasion with a rather unfortunate announcement, unless Joyce and Maureen can convince her to change her mind before she lives to regret it. Paula Wilcox, Alison Steadman, Stephanie Beacham, June Whitfield and James Smith star.(n)

programme.title: The Rebel
programme.desc: Henry is worried that Charles may have gone missing and finds a man wearing his friend's hat who says he bought it in a new charity shop in a converted church. Comedy, starring Simon Callow, Bill Paterson and Anita Dobson.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Dave is unhappy about Nessa's plans to let Smithy see the baby, while Stacey ensures Gavin sticks to his promise as she tries to find a new job. Meanwhile, Dawn and Pete join Pam and Mick for a beer and curry night. Comedy, starring Joanna Page and Mathew Horne.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Dara O Briain, Nina Conti and Danny Bhoy.
programme.desc: The stand-up comedy show has Dara O Briain warming up the crowd before introducing routines by ventriloquist extraordinaire Nina Conti and the irrepressible Danny Bhoy.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Mark rediscovers the single life following his disastrous marriage to Sophie, while he and Jeremy become victims of crime. Award-winning comedy, starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Richie and Eddie hear of a sure-fire way to make a lot of money on a horse race, but it isn't long before their plan lands them in trouble with the police, the local landlord and a one-legged Falklands veteran. Slapstick comedy, starring Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson.(n)
