He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: A youngster is forced to stage his own death to escape his cruel father, and embarks on a series of adventures accompanied by a runaway slave in 19th-century Mississippi. Disney adaptation of Mark Twain's classic tale, starring Elijah Wood, Courtney B Vance, Robbie Coltrane, Jason Robards, Dana Ivey, Anne Heche and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: A professor performs a social experiment designed to analyse abusive behaviour. He recruits 24 students and places them in a simulated prison, selecting some of the group to live as guards and some as convicts. The results take an unexpectedly terrifying turn, as power corrupts the guards and makes them indulge in sadistic behaviour. Fact-based drama, starring Billy Crudup and Ezra Miller.(n)

programme.title: Laid In America
programme.desc: With one night left in the United States, two exchange students hatch an elaborate plan to get into a house party and score with the girls of their dreams. Comedy, starring Olajide Olatunji, Caspar Lee and Bobby Lee.(n)

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Adult Beginners
programme.desc: Premiere. An entrepreneur on the brink of success instead loses everything when the product he launches is a failure, prompting his friends to turn their backs on him. He retreats to the safety of his sister's home, where he is allowed to stay on the condition he helps look after her three-year-old son. Despite his haphazard attitude to childcare, he forms a close relationship with his nephew. Comedy drama, starring Nick Kroll, Rose Byrne and Bobby Cannavale.(n)

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A poor teenager leaves home and hits the road with a crew of magazine sellers. She gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love while crossing the Midwest Inuted States. Drama, starring Sasha Lane, Shia LaBeouf and Riley Keough.(n)

programme.desc: Cameras follow events that took place at a 1970s Pennsylvania research facility used to investigate the existence of supernatural powers. Found-footage horror, starring Rya Kihlstedt, William Mapother and Sharon Maughan.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: White Island
programme.desc: A former DJ trying to live a normal life is dragged back into the seductive, drug-fuelled world of Ibiza nightclubs. Comedy, starring Lyndon Ogbourne, Billy Zane and Billy Boyd.(n)

programme.title: Inner Workings
programme.desc: Award winning animated Disney short that brings to life the constant internal struggle between head and heart.(n)

Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: After Love
programme.desc: Premiere. After 15 years of marriage, a couple with two children prepare to divorce. However, as the husband needs to find a new place to live, they have to cohabit, and figure out how to share their belongings. Drama, starring Berenice Bejo and Cedric Kahn.(n)

programme.title: Adult Beginners
programme.desc: Premiere. An entrepreneur on the brink of success instead loses everything when the product he launches is a failure, prompting his friends to turn their backs on him. He retreats to the safety of his sister's home, where he is allowed to stay on the condition he helps look after her three-year-old son. Despite his haphazard attitude to childcare, he forms a close relationship with his nephew. Comedy drama, starring Nick Kroll, Rose Byrne and Bobby Cannavale.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Android
programme.desc: A reclusive robotics expert shuts himself away from the world working on a secret project for years. He invites a science journalist to observe the fruits of his labours - an android capable of human emotion. However, they discover the machine has a dangerous side to its nature. Sci-fi thriller, starring Mark Webber and Lucy Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: Continuum
programme.desc: A physicist makes a discovery that throws fresh light on his father's unexplained disappearance. He seems to have been transported through time, and there is a chance to bring him back - but doing so has dangerous consequences, leaving the scientist and his mother with a terrible choice. Sci-fi drama, starring Gillian Anderson and Haley Joel Osment.(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: A family purchases a robot servant to perform menial tasks but quickly realises this is no ordinary droid when he begins to develop human emotions and the capacity to think for himself, a quality encouraged by his owner's children. He asks for his freedom, and spends the next 200 years struggling to come to terms with its humanity. Chris Columbus's sci-fi drama inspired by the books of Isaac Asimov, starring Robin Williams, Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz and Oliver Platt.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A guitarist and his fiancee are murdered on Halloween by the henchman of a world-weary gangster. One year later, the musician is restored to the land of the living by a mystical crow, and rendered indestructible so he can take revenge on the killers. Fantasy thriller based on the graphic novel, starring Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott and Ernie Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: A family purchases a robot servant to perform menial tasks but quickly realises this is no ordinary droid when he begins to develop human emotions and the capacity to think for himself, a quality encouraged by his owner's children. He asks for his freedom, and spends the next 200 years struggling to come to terms with its humanity. Chris Columbus's sci-fi drama inspired by the books of Isaac Asimov, starring Robin Williams, Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz and Oliver Platt.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Three eccentric scientists put their hi-tech gadgetry and knowledge of the paranormal to money-making use by setting up in business as freelance ghost catchers. A musician calls them in to investigate when she sees strange creatures in her kitchen, only to end up possessed. As the spook-hunting team members deal with an attempt to shut their operation down, they discover an evil demonic entity is being summoned into existence and it falls to them to stop this creature from destroying the world. Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn are instructed to protect Queen Amidala when her planet is invaded. Escorting her away from danger, they meet gifted youngster Anakin Skywalker, who seems ideally suited to join the pair's order - but is unaware of just how powerful he could become. Sci-fi prequel, starring Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman and Ray Park.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and apprentice Anakin Skywalker are sent to protect Senator Padme Amidala from an assassin. However, as galactic civil war threatens to erupt, the pair are forced to split their efforts, leading Anakin into an ill-advised romance and the beginnings of a journey toward the dark side. George Lucas's second prequel to the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Ewan McGregor, Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: Troubled Anakin Skywalker finds himself seduced by the dark side of the Force and is tempted into betraying his fellow Jedi Knights as conflict erupts across countless planets and the forces of evil prepare to seize control of the galaxy. The final instalment of the sci-fi prequel trilogy, with Hayden Christensen, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Samuel L Jackson, Ian McDiarmid and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario.(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: A world-weary former police officer encounters the Devil himself on New Year's Eve 1999, and is spurred into action to stop the Prince of Darkness exploiting an innocent woman to bring about Armageddon. Supernatural thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney, Rod Steiger, Kevin Pollak, CCH Pounder and Miriam Margolyes.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Three eccentric scientists put their hi-tech gadgetry and knowledge of the paranormal to money-making use by setting up in business as freelance ghost catchers. A musician calls them in to investigate when she sees strange creatures in her kitchen, only to end up possessed. As the spook-hunting team members deal with an attempt to shut their operation down, they discover an evil demonic entity is being summoned into existence and it falls to them to stop this creature from destroying the world. Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis.(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: An American hit man befriends a priest and a local woman while he waits in a small Italian village for his next assignment after his previous mission ended badly. But his current emotional entanglements may compromise his effectiveness(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Taut and engrossing fact-based thriller featuring tour-de-force performances by Ryan Phillippe and Chris Cooper. Phillippe plays an FBI trainee who is assigned to keep an eye on a fellow agent (Cooper) suspected of selling information to the Soviets. The film is based on the life of convicted spy Robert Hanssen. Directed by Billy Ray ("Shattered Glass"), who co-wrote the script with Adam Mazer and William Rotko. Laura Linney, Caroline Dhavernas, Gary Cole(n)

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A governess (Sarah Churchill) discovers that her charges are victims of evil spirits. Geoffrey Toone, Tommy Kirk. Based on "The Turn of the Screw," by Henry James(n)

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A hopeless drunk returns home following an incident that snaps him out of his stupor, and gets caught up in his nephew's scheme to sail off into the sunset in this dark drama starring John Malkovich and John Goodman. Mort Gleason (Malkovich hasn't been sober for 20 years. But one night, after witnessing his nephew Moo become the victim of a violent attack, Mort arrives at his sister's home in Chicago to reconnect with his sister Eileen's family. Meanwhile, Moo's younger brother Abe schemes with his best friend to purchase the Kathy II, a boat that could help them realize their dream of escaping their dreary lives. When Eileen leaves Mort in charge of the house while enjoying a rare night away from the family, Abe dupes his drunken uncle into buying the boat from unscrupulous liquor wholesaler Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman) - a transaction that sparks a series of unintended consequences(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny finally decides to marry her longterm partner and is forced to come out to her family, who believed her girlfriend was just her roommate. While her parents struggle with the revelation, she and her fiancee Kitty plan their wedding(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Last in the 'Evil Dead' trilogy. Granite-jawed Ash is whisked back to Arthurian England where he faces a legion of demonic hordes led by his own evil clone. Luckily, he has his car, his shotgun and a chainsaw for a right arm(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: In 1872 Wyoming, a Civil War veteran-turned-gunslinger (Kiefer Sutherland) must make amends with his estranged father (Donald Sutherland), a reverend who deplores his son's embrace of violence, as he tries to protect his hometown from ruthless land-grabbers. Jon Cassar directed this menacing Western, which also stars Demi Moore and Brian Cox. Forsaken received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: When a Vietnam veteran discovers two million dollars while wandering through the aftermath of a Texas drug deal gone horribly awry, his decision to abscond with the cash sets off a violent chain reaction(n)

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: In this heart-pounding thriller, a Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister(n)

programme.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: The first and the best of the recent crop of modern London-based gangster movies, directed by Guy 'Mr Madonna' Ritchie. Tom and his three friends find enough money to take on Hatchet Harry in a poker game but Tom's cheated out of his money and runs up a huge debt. To avoid the loss of some digits, the four have to come up with a money-making scheme and as luck would have it, an overheard conversation, two priceless antique shotguns and a rich drug dealer might just get them out of trouble. Fast-moving, elaborately plotted and with wonderful characters (including, of course, Vinnie Jones), this is intelligent filmmaking at its best(n)

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: A hardened detective enters into a tenuous symbiotic relationship with the vicious serial killer she is tracking after earning the respect of the murderous madman in this vicious psychological thriller starring Demi Moore, Kevin Costner, and William Hurt. Earl Brooks (Costner) is a successful businessman, noted philanthropist, and loving father. He's the kind of man whom no one would ever suspect of being a notorious serial killer, but then again history's most dubious psychopaths are often the quiet neighbor whom no one would ever suspect was capable of committing such unspeakable atrocities. Until now, no one has had any reason to link Earl Brooks with the heinous crimes of the dreaded Thumbprint Killer. Even his beautiful wife (Marg Helgenbeger) and teenage daughter (Danielle Panabaker) could never conceive of such an awful truth. But when Mr. Brooks's dark side begins to outshine his sane exterior, an amateur photographer (Dane Cook) captures the killer succumbing to his murderous instinct on film. Now, as Mr. Brooks is pursued by tenacious detective Tracy Atwood (Moore) and forced to bend to the will of an opportunistic bystander, the killer who was once able to keep his murderous alter ego (Hurt) in check finds his control steadily slipping(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: In this lurid action flick, a pack of corrupt cops plan the murder of an innocent fellow officer as a way to distract law enforcement from their simultaneous heist across town, but their target survives the attack and attempts to foil their plot(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: An American hit man befriends a priest and a local woman while he waits in a small Italian village for his next assignment after his previous mission ended badly. But his current emotional entanglements may compromise his effectiveness(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Taut and engrossing fact-based thriller featuring tour-de-force performances by Ryan Phillippe and Chris Cooper. Phillippe plays an FBI trainee who is assigned to keep an eye on a fellow agent (Cooper) suspected of selling information to the Soviets. The film is based on the life of convicted spy Robert Hanssen. Directed by Billy Ray ("Shattered Glass"), who co-wrote the script with Adam Mazer and William Rotko. Laura Linney, Caroline Dhavernas, Gary Cole(n)

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A governess (Sarah Churchill) discovers that her charges are victims of evil spirits. Geoffrey Toone, Tommy Kirk. Based on "The Turn of the Screw," by Henry James(n)

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A hopeless drunk returns home following an incident that snaps him out of his stupor, and gets caught up in his nephew's scheme to sail off into the sunset in this dark drama starring John Malkovich and John Goodman. Mort Gleason (Malkovich hasn't been sober for 20 years. But one night, after witnessing his nephew Moo become the victim of a violent attack, Mort arrives at his sister's home in Chicago to reconnect with his sister Eileen's family. Meanwhile, Moo's younger brother Abe schemes with his best friend to purchase the Kathy II, a boat that could help them realize their dream of escaping their dreary lives. When Eileen leaves Mort in charge of the house while enjoying a rare night away from the family, Abe dupes his drunken uncle into buying the boat from unscrupulous liquor wholesaler Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman) - a transaction that sparks a series of unintended consequences(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny finally decides to marry her longterm partner and is forced to come out to her family, who believed her girlfriend was just her roommate. While her parents struggle with the revelation, she and her fiancee Kitty plan their wedding(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: In 1872 Wyoming, a Civil War veteran-turned-gunslinger (Kiefer Sutherland) must make amends with his estranged father (Donald Sutherland), a reverend who deplores his son's embrace of violence, as he tries to protect his hometown from ruthless land-grabbers. Jon Cassar directed this menacing Western, which also stars Demi Moore and Brian Cox. Forsaken received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Ben Affleck is an airplane passenger traveling to his wedding in Georgia and Sandra Bullock is the charmer seated next to him in this delightful romance. When their flight experiences trouble, they decide to find other modes of transportation. Fighting, flirting and hitching rides, they seem destined to be together---despite his impending nuptials(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate with few job prospects is hired to care for a precocious four-year-old boy in this satirical urban comedy starring Scarlett Johansson, Paul Giamatti, Laura Linney, and Chris Evans. Annie Braddock (Johansson) is attempting to put her anthropology degree to good use in New York City with little success to show for her efforts. When a posh Upper East Side couple enlists Annie's aid in caring for their preschool-aged son, Annie's entire perspective is forever changed as she attempts to adjust to her new surroundings, shares a romance with a wealthy native boy, and strives to teach her charge the true meaning of happiness(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: Recently released from prison after serving time for a crime he didn't commit, Mo realizes that the rest of his community still sees him as a threat. He soon bonds with a woman trapped in an abusive relationship with a violent police officer, and vows to protect her from danger(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates star in writer/director Tyler Perry's family drama about an upper-crust family and their working-class counterparts, who discover that scandal knows no social boundaries. Charlotte Cartwright (Bates) and Alice Pratt (Woodard) may be from different sides of the tracks, yet over the years they've managed to nurture a strong and healthy friendship. That friendship is put to the ultimate test, however, when their adult children begin to act out in ways that neither parent ever saw coming. Alice's daughter Andrea (Sanaa Lathan) is married to a trusting husband named Chris (Rockmond Dunbar), but lately she's been betraying that trust by sleeping with her boss, William (Cole Hauser), who just so happens to be Charlotte's son. William is married to Jillian (KaDee Strickland), and in addition to being unfaithful, he's also scheming to take over the role of COO at his mother's lucrative construction firm. Meanwhile, Alice's other daughter, Pam (Taraji P. Henson), and her husband, Ben (Perry), a faithful family man and construction worker, have both recognized that their family has strayed from the course of righteousness, and become determined to help their loved ones back on the right path. When paternity secrets, shady double dealings, and a series of other scandals become too much for Charlotte and Alice to take, the two women set out on a cross-country trip in order to clear their heads and devise a plan for saving their families(n)

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Nancy Meyers' version of the story first filmed in 1953, and again in 1961, stars Lindsay Lohan as identical twins Hallie and Annie James, who meet for the first time at summer camp and realise they've been split up at birth by their divorced parents Nick and Elizabeth. The girls come up with a plan to swap identities to try to get their parents back together... This charming family film never descends into schmaltz, thanks in part to the supporting roles of Elaine Hendrix as the gold digger after Nick's money and Simon Kunz as Elizabeth's acidly droll butler(n)

programme.desc: An American hit man befriends a priest and a local woman while he waits in a small Italian village for his next assignment after his previous mission ended badly. But his current emotional entanglements may compromise his effectiveness(n)

programme.title: Safelight
programme.desc: A teenage boy (Evan Peters) and a young prostitute (Juno Temple) take a road trip up the California coast to photograph lighthouses. However, her abusive pimp could cause the journey to end in violence in this gritty drama from writer/director Tony Aloupis(n)

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: Four men stole a fortune in gold bullion but one betrayed the rest. After he's murdered in Paris, his young wife races to find the loot and evade the thugs who are also searching for the cash. Suspenser packed with great names and red herrings(n)

programme.title: Unknown Caller
programme.desc: A psychopath terrorises a family with a ticking time bomb in their security system and demands they tell him who he really is(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Three overstrained, overworked mums plan a holiday and decides to blow off their responsibilities. But their wild ways creates a clash with a rival mummy, who's committed to preserving the facade of her perfect life(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: In this taut political thriller, a British screenwriter (Ewan McGregor) agrees to ghostwrite the memoirs of a retired prime minister, but after he takes the job the former political leader is accused of committing a war crime. As the writer uncovers facts that corroborate these suspicions, he begins to fear he might be killed, just like the man who worked on the memoirs before him. Directed by Roman Polanski. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams(n)

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: Evan Rachel Wood ("Thirteen") gives a superb performance in this outrageous and wickedly funny black comedy. She plays a scheming Beverly Hills high schooler who falsely accuses a teacher of sexual harassment to advance her acting career. Ron Livingston, James Woods, Jane Krakowski, Elisabeth Harnois. Directed by Marcos Siega(n)

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A governess (Sarah Churchill) discovers that her charges are victims of evil spirits. Geoffrey Toone, Tommy Kirk. Based on "The Turn of the Screw," by Henry James(n)

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Rob Zombie provides a brutal back story to the Michael Myers legend in this bloody remake of John Carpenter's classic slasher(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: A lonely animal-shelter employee kidnaps a woman he's developed a crush on, and keeps her locked in a cage at his work. However, she is guarding secrets of her own that help her turn the tables on her captor(n)

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former "Daily Show With Jon Stewart" correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics, such as cilantro politics, anger management and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge(n)

programme.desc: Female prisoners in a mysterious underground fortress must fight to the death to save their loved ones on the outside(n)

programme.desc: A couple on the hunt for Bigfoot get more than they bargained for when they go into the woods to the location of a fabled sighting. Found-footage chiller. Strong language(n)

programme.title: Echoes of War
programme.desc: After the Civil War concludes, a veteran (James Badge Dale) returns home to his Texas countryside ranch. Attempting to rid himself of the horrors of war, he finds himself embattled in a conflict with a neighboring rancher(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: In the war-torn Balkans of 1995, a group of humanitarian-aid workers led by Mambrú (Benicio Del Toro) attempt to save a community's water supply, which has been contaminated by the presence of a corpse in a local well. However, their mission is complicated by bureaucratic indifference and the possibility that any situation could erupt in sudden violence. Tim Robbins, Mélanie Thierry, and Olga Kurylenko co-star. Directed by Fernando León de Aranoa(n)

programme.desc: Comedian Godfrey delivers a stand-up routine in his hometown of Chicago(n)

programme.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: The first and the best of the recent crop of modern London-based gangster movies, directed by Guy 'Mr Madonna' Ritchie. Tom and his three friends find enough money to take on Hatchet Harry in a poker game but Tom's cheated out of his money and runs up a huge debt. To avoid the loss of some digits, the four have to come up with a money-making scheme and as luck would have it, an overheard conversation, two priceless antique shotguns and a rich drug dealer might just get them out of trouble. Fast-moving, elaborately plotted and with wonderful characters (including, of course, Vinnie Jones), this is intelligent filmmaking at its best(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Two Irish brothers violently take on gangsters in Boston. Willem Dafoe, Sean Patrick Flanery, Norman Reedus(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A reformed criminal is persuaded by his ex to rob a London bank, little realising he's being set up by the authorities(n)

programme.title: Strikeforce Challengers
programme.desc: From 2011: Tyron Woodley vs. Tarec Saffiedine in a welterweight bout in Nashville. Also: Daniel Cormier vs. Devin Cole in a heavyweight match(n)

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: A hardened detective enters into a tenuous symbiotic relationship with the vicious serial killer she is tracking after earning the respect of the murderous madman in this vicious psychological thriller starring Demi Moore, Kevin Costner, and William Hurt. Earl Brooks (Costner) is a successful businessman, noted philanthropist, and loving father. He's the kind of man whom no one would ever suspect of being a notorious serial killer, but then again history's most dubious psychopaths are often the quiet neighbor whom no one would ever suspect was capable of committing such unspeakable atrocities. Until now, no one has had any reason to link Earl Brooks with the heinous crimes of the dreaded Thumbprint Killer. Even his beautiful wife (Marg Helgenbeger) and teenage daughter (Danielle Panabaker) could never conceive of such an awful truth. But when Mr. Brooks's dark side begins to outshine his sane exterior, an amateur photographer (Dane Cook) captures the killer succumbing to his murderous instinct on film. Now, as Mr. Brooks is pursued by tenacious detective Tracy Atwood (Moore) and forced to bend to the will of an opportunistic bystander, the killer who was once able to keep his murderous alter ego (Hurt) in check finds his control steadily slipping(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A plastic surgeon reports the disappearance of his wife, and Goren suspects there is more to the case than meets the eye, but struggles to find any flaws in the doctor's alibi. programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)

programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way(n)

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: Jewish David Green is brought into a prestigious school in the 1950s to help beat the football team. However, David keeps his ethnicity secret through fear of being rejected. Stars Matt Damon.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)
Maths genius Ben is recruited to join a team of card-counters. They're making a mint, until they catch the eye of Vegas security chief Cole(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: As a huge comet blasts towards Earth, America sends up a team of ace astronauts to blast a hole in it before it obliterates humanity(n)

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk

However, the experience only makes him feel more alienated from a society that doesn't truly understand or appreciate the sacrifices of its soldiers(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: In this adventure-filled sequel to the 2004 blockbuster 'National Treasure', Nicolas Cage reprises his role as artifact hunter and archaeologist Benjamin Franklin Gates. During a lecture about John Wilkes Booth (Abraham Lincoln¿s murderer) and Thomas Gates (Ben¿s great-grandfather), another treasure hunter by the name of Mitch Wilkinson stands up and presents a missing page of Booth¿s diary -- where Thomas is mentioned as a co-conspirator in Lincoln¿s assassination. Outraged, Ben decides to prove the honor of his ancestor, and together with his wife, Abigail, and his best friend, the writer Riley Poole, heads to France, England and Washington to collect clues(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: The story of the only Irishman ever deported from Ireland, Jimmy Gralton, who was arrested and ousted during the country's Red Scare of the 1930s(n)

programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: In 16th century Europe, Danielle endures an unhappy life with her mean stepmother, but finds she has a chance for happiness through an encounter with the handsome Prince Henry. However, with so much separating the lowly Danielle from her prince, it seems that she doesn't stand a chance of living happily ever after. Romance(n)

programme.title: Honey 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the 2004 film, Katerina Graham stars as Maria, an ex-con teen who learns how to channel the negative aspects of her life into dance(n)

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: A 15-year-old farm boy steals a cache of drug money in order to run away with his abused next-door neighbor. However, the two of them are pursued by her father, a corrupt cop, in this taut thriller(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Anarchic, nihilistic satire on modern life in which an office worker who feels emotionally deadened by his consumerist lifestyle has a chance encounter with a charismatic man. Finding that they are kindred spirits, the two men start up a no-holds-barred bare-knuckle fighting club, with the aim of making its members feel 'alive' once again(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A young man following in his father's footsteps signs up for the Marines just in time to fight in the Gulf War. His journey is followed from boot camp to battlefield as he fights as a sniper beside his brothers in arms(n)

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: A 15-year-old farm boy steals a cache of drug money in order to run away with his abused next-door neighbor. However, the two of them are pursued by her father, a corrupt cop, in this taut thriller(n)

programme.title: Elle
programme.desc: In this deeply unsettling thriller, a woman decides to hunt down the man who sexually assaulted her instead of going to the police. When she finally tracks down her assailant, they become locked in a dangerous game that threatens to consume them both(n)

programme.title: The Armstrong Lie
programme.desc: Lance Armstrong was a sporting phenomenon: an American who'd not only set his sights on the world's oldest and most prestigious Grand Tour cycle race, the Tour de France, but had won it seven consecutive times between 1999 and 2005. And that was after surviving testicular cancer. Of course there were dark mutterings of doping, but Armstrong consistently, forcefully and litigiously countered such allegations. So, when he announced his intention to return to the fray in 2009, after a four-year retirement, the prolific, Oscar-winning documentary-maker Alex Gibney jumped at the chance to film the maligned Texan's attempt to win the Tour an eighth time. Given unprecedented access to Armstrong and his team, Gibney's documentary The Road Back was about to be released when the truth about Armstrong's systematic drug-taking broke. Gibney shelved the project for a couple of years, and then began to transform his film, via the addition of interviews with Armstrong's detractors and footage of the cyclist's own admissions of guilt, from an upbeat observational piece into something altogether more critical. What emerged is an absorbing and fascinating study of a monumentally arrogant sportsman's determination to do whatever it took to win and his equal willingness to do or say whatever was necessary to cover up his less savoury actions. And the film perhaps also serves as a warning for documentary-makers not to side too strongly with their subject too soon(n)

programme.title: The Pope of Greenwich Village
programme.desc: Two cousins who rob a Mafia safe and accidentally kill a cop, landing them in deep trouble with both the organised-crime bosses and the strong arm of the law(n)

programme.title: Before Midnight
programme.desc: Almost two decades after meeting, Jesse and Celine wrestle with marriage and kids in Greece. Romance/drama(n)

programme.title: 5 Days of War
programme.desc: A war correspondent covers Russia's 2008 invasion of Georgia and attempts to help a teacher rescue her family during the chaos(n)

programme.title: Sugar Mountain
programme.desc: A man in desperate need of cash (Drew Roy) hatches a potentially lucrative plan with his brother (Shane Coffey) and girlfriend (Haley Webb) to fake their disappearances in the wilderness in the hope of later selling their story. But their scheme goes awry when they attract the attention of a suspicious sheriff (Cary Elwes) and a menacing hoodlum (Jason Momoa)(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: This innovative, free-form biopic of jazzman Miles Davis depicts his attempts at a career comeback following a period of listlessness in the '70s, his relationship with a journalist who wants to profile him and his troubled marriage to a former dancer(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Terry Gilliam's film stars Johnny Depp as Raoul Duke (a thinly disguised Thompson) and Benicio Del Toro as his companion Dr. Gonzo en route to Las Vegas to report on a convention of district attorneys, fuelled only by a collection of almost every illegal drug going and enough booze to float a battleship(n)

programme.title: I'm So Excited!
programme.desc: The passengers and crew of an airliner find their lives in jeopardy due to a technical failure, and experience a collective catharsis that helps to ward off the specter of death as the pilots work to land the plane safely in this wild comedy(n)

programme.title: Father of Invention
programme.desc: In this poignant comedy, disgraced businessman Robert Axle works as a janitor after serving a prison sentence for gross negligence, and eventually he decides to rebuild his fortune by creating a new gadget(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: 1980s teen comedies finally get the parody they so richly deserve with Wet Hot American Summer, the first feature film from writer/director David Wain and co-screenwriter Michael Showalter, formerly of the sketch comedy troupe the State. It's the last day of the summer season at Camp Firewood, and as camp director Beth (Janeane Garofalo) prepares to wrap things up, the staff of teenage counselors realize this is their last chance to do something about the summer romances that have been brewing for the past three months. Sweet but shy Coop (Michael Showalter) is crazy about pretty Katie (Marguerite Moreau), but there's the problem of her severely moody boyfriend Andy (Paul Rudd). Meanwhile, Victor (Ken Marino) is trying to score with sexy Abby (Marisa Ryan), who is known to make friends easily, and McKinley (Michael Ian Black) and Ben (Bradley Cooper) attempt to keep their hot and heavy relationship a secret. Meanwhile, arts and crafts teacher Gail (Molly Shannon) turns to her students for comfort as her marriage falls apart, drama coach Susie (Amy Poehler) tries to whip the talent show into shape with Ben's help, and camp chef Gene (Christopher Meloni) deals with his unique sexual quirks with the help of a talking can of vegetables (voiced by H. Jon Benjamin). Beth even finds time for romance with socially inept astrophysicist Henry (David Hyde Pierce), but first Henry has to save Camp Firewood from a large piece of space junk about to re-enter Earth's atmosphere. Like Wain and Showalter, Ken Marino, Michael Ian Black, and Joe Lo Truglio (who appears in a small role) were also members of the State; fellow State alumnus Kerri Kenney was cast in a supporting role in the film, but her character didn't appear in the final cut(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead

programme.desc: A Boston publisher falls for a widowed carpenter she hired to do repair work. Star Faye Dunaway's foray into series TV was a disappointment; only four episodes aired(n)

programme.desc: In this touching drama, a musician reeling from personal and professional disappointments moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: American Me
programme.desc: An epic and compelling drama from actor/director Edward James Olmos. The film follows three generations of a Hispanic American family, from the 1943 Pachuco Los Angelean riots to the turmoil of the mid-1970s. Olmos himself plays Santana, a crime lord who rules over the LA underworld from within his cell in Folsom State Prison, Sacramento. The film charts the rise of the so-called Mexican Mafia in a brutal and disturbing fashion, but retains the message that gang warfare, for whatever reason, can never be justified(n)

programme.desc: Straight-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed(n)

programme.desc: A 13-year-old Mongolian girl named Aisholpan Nurgaiv strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders. Directed by Otto Bell(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Oscar-nominee Joaquin Phoenix plays Johnny Cash, and Oscar-winner Reese Witherspoon plays June Carter in James Mangold's acclaimed biographical film about country music's legendary "man in black". The film follows Cash from his childhood, where he was touched by tragedy, through his years on the road to his marriage to June Carter, who was country royalty, and their struggle to find happiness as she weans him off booze and drugs. Walk the Line is a warts-and- all biopic, showing Cash's faults as well as his undoubted star quality as one of the greatest singer/ songwriters that America has ever produced(n)

The unorthodox Buck is the last person you'd want to watch the kids. But there's no one else. Tony Shalhoub, Daryl Mitchell(n)

programme.desc: An inept criminal's girlfriend is kidnapped while he is in Mexico trying to pull off one final job(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: Expert, thrilling adaptation of John le Carré's best-selling novel exploring political corruption and pharmaceutical company malfeasance in Africa(n)

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: Three years after the murder of her family, Donna is finally getting her life back together. But it all falls apart on prom night when the killer returns to finish her off(n)

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Cultists with an enigmatic leader seize the only man capable of devising a way to stop a giant meteor from hitting the Earth. A female agent teams up with a prisoner , who together have tree days to rescue the scientist and save the planet(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man(n)

programme.title: Fresh
programme.desc: Cautionary tale about inner-city hopelessness, focusing on a 12-year-old drug carrier and his struggle for survival on Brooklyn streets(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Lots of laughs and a great camaraderie is the recipe for two street-wise cops that have decided to quit the force and open a bar. However, the duo's plans come to an abrupt halt when Julio, a drug dealer who nearly killed them, has made bail and is about to complete a major drug deal. This motivates the two to stick with police work and bring Julio to justice(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: In the UN building in New York, interpreter Silvia claims that African dictator Zuwanie is about to be assassinated. Zuwanie's FBI minder Keller doesn't believe Silvia, until the conspirators try to kill her(n)

programme.title: The Caveman's Valentine
programme.desc: A man struggles back from madness to avenge the death of someone he knew in an intelligent thriller based on the acclaimed novel by George Dawes Green. Romulus Ledbetter (Samuel L. Jackson) once had a career as an acclaimed concert pianist, a position at the Juilliard School of Music, and a loving wife and children. But Ledbetter's life has been devastated by paranoid schizophrenia; now homeless, Ledbetter wanders the streets of New York City as he rails against Cornelius Gould Stuyvesant, a man whom he believes controls all the evil in the world while following his movements from a perch atop the Chrysler Building. Most nights, Ledbetter takes shelter in a cave in Central Park, earning him the nickname "the Caveman." One morning, Ledbetter discovers a frozen corpse caught in the branches of a tree near his cave; the body is that of Scotty (Sean MacMahaon), a homeless drug addict who was close friends with his pal Matthew (Rodney Eastman). Ledbetter is determined to get justice for Scotty, and he's also eager to prove himself to his daughter Lulu (Aunjanue Ellis), now a New York City police officer. While Ledbetter is at first convinced that his nemesis Stuyvesant is responsible for Scotty's death, in time he focuses on another suspect: David Leppenraub (Colm Feore), a famous photographer known for his controversial erotic images of young men, who occasionally hired Scotty as a model. As Ledbetter attempts to investigate Leppenraub's possible role in the murder, he soon gains an unexpected ally -- Moira (Ann Magnuson), a noted sculptor and Leppenraub's sister. The Caveman's Valentine marked the major-studio debut for director Kasi Lemmons, who made an impressive debut in 1997 with the independent drama Eve's Bayou(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Angela Bassett stars in this sexy, sassy romantic comedy about a 40-year-old mother who realises her life may be heading in the wrong direction. Stella Payne is a workaholic San Franciscan executive who spends what little spare time she has with her family. But then it occurs to her that she's missing out on something big - romance. Having encountered Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs), a Jamaican man 20 years her junior, Stella decides the time has come to get back on the dating circuit. but just how will she go about getting back her groove?(n)

programme.title: The Caveman's Valentine
programme.desc: A man struggles back from madness to avenge the death of someone he knew in an intelligent thriller based on the acclaimed novel by George Dawes Green. Romulus Ledbetter (Samuel L. Jackson) once had a career as an acclaimed concert pianist, a position at the Juilliard School of Music, and a loving wife and children. But Ledbetter's life has been devastated by paranoid schizophrenia; now homeless, Ledbetter wanders the streets of New York City as he rails against Cornelius Gould Stuyvesant, a man whom he believes controls all the evil in the world while following his movements from a perch atop the Chrysler Building. Most nights, Ledbetter takes shelter in a cave in Central Park, earning him the nickname "the Caveman." One morning, Ledbetter discovers a frozen corpse caught in the branches of a tree near his cave; the body is that of Scotty (Sean MacMahaon), a homeless drug addict who was close friends with his pal Matthew (Rodney Eastman). Ledbetter is determined to get justice for Scotty, and he's also eager to prove himself to his daughter Lulu (Aunjanue Ellis), now a New York City police officer. While Ledbetter is at first convinced that his nemesis Stuyvesant is responsible for Scotty's death, in time he focuses on another suspect: David Leppenraub (Colm Feore), a famous photographer known for his controversial erotic images of young men, who occasionally hired Scotty as a model. As Ledbetter attempts to investigate Leppenraub's possible role in the murder, he soon gains an unexpected ally -- Moira (Ann Magnuson), a noted sculptor and Leppenraub's sister. The Caveman's Valentine marked the major-studio debut for director Kasi Lemmons, who made an impressive debut in 1997 with the independent drama Eve's Bayou(n)

programme.title: The Velveteen Rabbit
programme.desc: Live-action filmmaking mixes with imaginative animation in director Michael Landon Jr.'s feature adaptation of author Margery Williams' beloved children's book. An energetic child with a vivid imagination, Toby Morgan (Matthew Harbour) lives with his father (Kevin Jubinville), a successful businessman who seemed to shut down emotionally following the death of Toby's mother. When Toby is sent to spend the Christmas holidays with his loving but stern grandmother (Una Kay), he wanders through the lonely house until he eventually discovers the "magic attic" that was once his father's childhood playroom. There, Toby is surprised to find that his mother left him a stuffed velveteen rabbit -- her final gift to her beloved son. Hugging the rabbit close as he starts to cry, the grieving boy watches in wonder as his tears magically bring the toy to life. Before long, Toby is frolicking in the enchanted attic with a whole new group of friends, including the impetuous Horse (voiced by Tom Skerritt) and the wise but skittish Swan (voice of Ellen Burstyn). Toby's one wish is to spend Christmas with his father, and Rabbit's one wish is to someday hop across the fields as a real rabbit. Later, when Toby falls seriously ill, the courageous Rabbit helps him to win over his grandmother and make a full recovery. When Toby's father returns in time for Christmas, the power of the young child's love grants the Velveteen Rabbit its one true wish(n)

programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Brian Cox star in this comedy action-thriller from director Robert Schwentke. Frank Moses quickly becomes all too familiar with the acronym RED - Retired, Extremely Dangerous - when his former CIA bosses send a crack squad to kill their best-ever hitman. But the extremely dangerous retiree proves more than a match for them. Realising the Agency won't give up so easily, he goes on the run and abducts, for her own safety, Sarah Ross, the pension worker he's fallen in love with over the phone. Still in the dark as to exactly why his country wants him dead, Moses sets out to find out, gathering around him a group of equally ageing-but-deadly friends and associates. Can the wily old foxes evade, overcome and/ or outgun the crème de la crème of a new generation's black ops people, led by William Cooper, to discover the truth? What follows is a non-stop onslaught of witty one-liners, gunshots and explosions... and a masterclass in knowing acting(n)

programme.title: RED 2
programme.desc: Frank (Bruce Willis), Sarah (Mary-Louise Parker), and Marvin (John Malkovich) fight an unrelenting onslaught of hired killers, heavily armed terrorists, and powerful government officials in their desperate race to prevent a missing portable nuclear device from falling into the wrong hands. Sir Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Lee Byung-hun, and Catherine Zeta Jones co-star(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Monster in the Closet. A social worker's remains are found, but evidence suggests the victim had been dead for months before the body was dumped in a park, and the case gets even more twisted when it's linked to a serial killer known for desecrating corpses. Meanwhile, Booth and Aubrey hope a behavioral analyst can provide some clues about the murderer; and Cam tries to sort out her romantic life(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Last Shot at a Second Chance
programme.desc: The Last Shot at a Second Chance. programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Fight in the Fixer. Meanwhile, Aubrey learns shocking information about his father; Brennan and Booth get Christine's first report card; and Karen Delfs asks Aubrey if he wants to go on a date(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Strike in the Chord. A body found in a rat lab at Lynwood University turns out to be the head of a male a cappella group who recently ejected one of their best singers. programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Secret in the Service. A Secret Service agent's body is discovered by an inebriated university student on the eve of a presidential visit, but Booth is blindsided when the agency refuses his help with the case. Meanwhile, Brennan won't let the flu keep her from work even though Dr Colin Fisher has returned to the Jeffersonian to lead the investigation; and Hodgins attempts a risky experiment to change his life(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Movie in the Making. programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: Filmmaker Guillermo del Toro teams up with Legendary Pictures to bring audiences a unique take on the monster film with this sci-fi production. Charlie Hunnam (Sons of Anarchy) stars as a washed-out controller and pilot of a series of robots called Jaegers, which are put into production after Earth is invaded by a species of giant monsters, the Kaijus. The Brothers Bloom's Rinko Kikuchi co-stars as a trainee whom Hunnam is psychically paired with in order to pilot the last beacon of hope -- a decommissioned Jaeger assigned to stop the Kaijus once and for all. Thor's Idris Elba leads the rest of the starring cast, which includes Charlie Day, Rob Kazinsky and Ron Perlman(n)

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When aliens attack LA, Marine Staff Sergeant Michael Nantz must lead his platoon in a desperate fight against the invaders(n)
